targets.query: SELECT "state" AS "State", "alert_roaming" AS "Roaming", "currently_obstructed" AS "Obstructed", "alert_unexpected_location" AS "Bad Location", "alert_thermal_throttle" AS "Temp Throttled", "alert_thermal_shutdown" AS "Temp Shutdown", "alert_motors_stuck" AS "Motors Stuck", "software_version" AS "Software Version", "alert_slow_ethernet_speeds" AS "Slow Speed", "alert_is_heating" AS "Heating", "alert_mast_not_near_vertical" AS "Mast Not Vertical" FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.status" WHERE $timeFilter
